mapper.update: merge into delivery d using (select purchase_num from purchase where purchase_num = #{purchaseNum}) p on (d.purchase_num = p.purchase_num) WHEN MATCHED THEN update set DELIVERY_NUM = #{deliveryNum} WHEN not MATCHED THEN insert (PURCHASE_NUM, DELIVERY_NUM, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_STATE) values (#{purchaseNum},#{deliveryNum},sysdate,'배송중')
